name: Battery Powered UFO
description:
Battery Powered UFO 

A UFO has entered a strange planet. Strange things inhabit the planet and fire at any intruder. Steal their energy source them and stay alive for as long as possible while staying out of their perception.

Controls:

Gamepad compatible

Arrows - Control

X - Attack

Music and sound effects from Pixabay

https://gotm.io/typeg4/batterypoweredufo
